entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Flurries over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
